alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:01PM CDT until March 31 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WOODRUFF...NORTHEASTERN PRAIRIE AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Patterson, or 12 miles southeast of Augusta, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Des Arc... Dixie... Sand Hill... Little Dixie... McClelland... Gregory... Georgetown... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and eastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
